short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cross-browser web extension that enhances and facilitates interaction with code blocks on https://world.hey.com/.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cross-browser web extension that enhances and facilitates interaction with code blocks on https://world.hey.com/. It includes features for highlighting code for better readability (dark and light themes, and it also remember your selection) and a one-click function to copy code snippets directly from the webpage.
